question: Most common benign hea tumor is:
exp: Myxomas are the most common primary tumor of the hea in adults. They are benign in nature. 90% are located in the atria, with a left-to-right ratio of approximately 4: 1 (atrial myxomas). The tumors are almost always single. Favored site of origin: fossa ovalis in the atrial septum Histopathology of Myxoma: - LEPIDIC CELLS - seen in presence of MYXOID MATRIX.
